name: ChronoDojo
description:
Play solo or party with friends in this cute, cooperative combination of tower defense and beat 'em up action! Travel through time, leap through levels, quickly construct trusty towers, and battle against wave after wave of zany enemies!

Will you become a master of Chrono-Fu and save the world from evil?

    Play as adorable, humble heroes! (Custodian, Cook, Gardener, Fixer, Deliverer, Nurse)
    Bash baddies, build towers and battle bosses in three unique times in history!
    Accelerate and slow the flow of time in each level to achieve maximum victory!
    Unlock an arsenal of stylish shoes, wacky weapons, powerful pets and beverage boosts!
    Loveable, light-hearted and fast-paced fun for all ages and skill levels!

    Keyboard support for 1 player.
    Controller support for 1-4 players.
    (at least one controller required for local multiplayer)
